Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class ClientStatus

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.ClientStatus
public class ClientStatus
extends Observable
It keeps information about the turn, the color, the card and the actions
